Small correction. It is also happening with Jira editors.

Fixed by handling a null list of viewers gracefully.  However, we should not get into a null state there since that could potentially indicate a configuration problem, so an info message with details will be printed to the log.  If you ever see one of these from ContentOutlineManager please report it.
